snippet: President Obama nominated Caitlin J. Halligan and Sri Srinivasan to fill vacancies on the powerful District of Columbia appeals court.
abstract: Pres Obama nominates lawyers Caitlin J Halligan and Sri Srinivasan to fill vacancies on the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit, a powerful panel to which he has so far been unable to appoint anyone; it is unlikely that either will get a Senate floor vote this year because the judicial confirmation process often slows down as a presidential election nears.
lead_paragraph: President Obama nominated Caitlin J. Halligan and Sri Srinivasan to fill vacancies on the powerful District of Columbia appeals court.

headline.seo: Obama Nominates Halligan and Srinivasan to D.C. Appeals Court
headline.main: Obama Nominates Two for Federal Appeals Court
headline.print_headline: Obama Nominates Two Lawyers for the Federal Appeals Court in Washington
